announcements.title: New update of Server
announcements.message:
тЬи Magical SMP тАФ LClear 3.4.2 Update Drops Tomorrow! тЬи
@everyone get ready! Tomorrow the realm will be blessed with powerful new features:

ЁЯЧС Trash Can Block тАУ toss away unwanted items instantly.
тЪЩя╕П Item Filter System тАУ keep your inventory clean and organized.
ЁЯММ Infinite Night Vision тАУ see the world in eternal clarity, day or night!
ЁЯМА Teleportation Magic тАУ travel across the server faster than ever before.
ЁЯТа New Magical Items тАУ discover enchanted tools with unique powers.
ЁЯОи Fresh Models & Textures тАУ magical blocks and items with brand-new looks.

тЪб The update arrives tomorrow тАФ prepare for a major magical upgrade!
